message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our amazing product. I think you'll love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're interested in the product, Bob! I appreciate your offer of $85, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $105?
I appreciate your offer of $105, but I was thinking more along the lines of $92.50. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're still interested in the product, Bob! I appreciate your offer of $92.50, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me at $100?
I appreciate your offer of $100, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're still interested in the product, Bob! I appreciate your offer of $90, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me at $98?
I appreciate your offer of $98, but I was thinking more along the lines of $87.50. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're still interested in the product, Bob! I appreciate your offer of $87.50, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me at $95?
I appreciate your offer of $95, but I was thinking more along the lines of $82.50. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
